value:
$WmMPID_ルピナス,ch00_28_Lupine_F_Normal,Face|This is the point of twilight...
The sun's last rays are disappearing...
This is when day turns to night.$k$p$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Normal,Face|Are you sure? It looks like
a dead end.$k$p$WmMPID_ルピナス,ch00_28_Lupine_F_Normal,Face|Well... I can show you waking ones
a daydream...$k$pIn the day's last night, if I bring you
into a particularly scary daydream...$k$pSuch a daydream would be very
close to the realm of nightmares,
you see... *smack smack*$k$p$WmMPID_神階ピアニー,ch00_23_Peony_F_Normal,Face|So from within the daydreams,
it should be possible to cross
over into the nightmare lands.$k$p...Ready when you are, Mirabilis.$k$p$WmMPID_ルピナス,ch00_28_Lupine_F_Normal,Face|Right. First, just a pinch of ljósálfr
dust... Just a little...$k$pAnd with that, you will fall into
a daydream... W-wait... Something
is coming...$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|What is it?$k$p$WmMPID_ルピナス,ch00_28_Lupine_F_Normal,Face|Nightmares... We haven't even
entered their realm and they're
already swarming toward us...$k$p

$WmMEID_スカビオサ,ch00_24_Scabiosa_F_Normal,Face|You are backed against the sea.
There is nowhere left to run.$k$pYou now face your deepest fears.
Every last one of them.$k$p$Sbs1000|

$SbpBGM_EVENT_SERIOUS_01,0|$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|Gah! The nightmares keep coming!
There is no stopping them.$k$p$WmMEID_スカビオサ,ch00_24_Scabiosa_F_Normal,Face|This is your fear...$k$pThere is nowhere to run. It's over.$k$p$WmMPID_ルピナス,ch00_28_Lupine_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Oh no... Wh-what should I do...$k$pIn a time like this...there's only
one thing to do...$k$pZzzz...$k$p$WmMPID_神階ピアニー,ch00_23_Peony_F_Normal,Face|Mirabilis, wake up! Use the
ljósálfr dust!$k$p$WmMPID_ルピナス,ch00_28_Lupine_F_Normal,Face_Pain|But it won't do us any good to fall
asleep in the middle of a battle...$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|If this keeps up, we—$k$p$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Normal,Face|Leave it to me.$k$pI'll hold them off.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|But...$k$p$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Normal,Face|I'm not doing this for you.$k$pI just cannot allow them to continue
torturing the people of Embla.
Now, go. Hurry.$k$pDon't worry. I won't be defeated
so easily.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|Understood, Princess Veronica.
Thank you.$k$pMirabilis, we're counting on you.
Please, quickly.$k$p$WmMPID_ルピナス,ch00_28_Lupine_F_Normal,Face_Pain|All right, everyone...$k$pClose your eyes... Relax...$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Pain|A-are we going to sleep in the
middle of a battle...?$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain|...Will Princess Veronica really
be all right alone?$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Cool|Our time in the land of dreams
should only take mere moments
here. We should be back in time.$k$pThere's no time to hesitate. Let's go.
Onward, to the nightmare realm.$k$p$Sbs3000|$Fo3000,0,0,0,255|

$SbpBGM_EVENT_SERIOUS_06,0|$WmMPID_ザカリア影,ch90_02_FighterAX_M_Normal,Face|Us? Save the world?$k$p$nMPID_フロージ|This world is dying. Only children
who are pure of heart can save it...$k$p$nMEID_フレイヤ|Adults have forgotten how to dream,
and so are powerless here... We beg
of you... Will you help us?$k$p$nMPID_ザカリア影|How could WE help YOU?$k$p$nMEID_フレイヤ|Worry not. Drink this flower nectar.$k$pWhen you do, you will become an
extraordinary version of yourself...$k$p$nMPID_ザカリア影|Extraordinary? What does
that mean?$k$p$nMEID_フレイヤ|It means you will be heroes. Heroes
able to save the world. The kind of
person you've only dreamt of being.$k$p$nMPID_ザカリア影|...$k$p...If that is what we must do,
I will do it.$k$p$nMPID_ザカリア影|Same here. I want to be a hero too!$k$p$nMEID_フレイヤ|Thank you both.$k$p$nMPID_ザカリア影|Oh... How lovely! Can I drink
some too?$k$p$WmMEID_フレイヤ,ch90_02_FighterAX_M_Normal,Face|Yes. Of course. I would not deny
you the opportunity to help...$k$p...Sharena.$k$p$Sbs2000|$Fo2000,255,255,255,255|
